title: Inheritance
overview: Learn how classes in Python can inherit properties and methods from other classes. Inheritance promotes code reuse and allows building hierarchical class structures.
topics: Using super() to access parent methods
practice: Override a method in child class.
Create a class hierarchy with Vehicle as parent and Car and Bike as children.
Demonstrate multiple inheritance with two parent classes.

quiz.question: Which function is used to call a parent class constructor?

summary: Inheritance allows Python classes to reuse code from parent classes and extend or override their behavior. It is fundamental for building scalable and organized programs with hierarchical relationships.
